divs: sighting detailstwo of us were sitting in rosicrucian park in san jose in the early afternoon relaxing in the park. we were looking at the sky, watching a bird and noticed a round object rotating\reflecting sunlight above cloud cover. hovered and then drifted northward. was above nearby aircraft. video obtained. eventually it traveled upward\northward and we lost sight of it.
Summary: Rotating/flashing orb hovering in the North behind cloud cover, drifted slowly Northward.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There was one other sighting in San Jose on or around August 18th 2013
